font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 勒索： to obtain from a person by force, intimidation, or undue or illegal power
【例】 The criminals extorted large sums of money from their victims受害人
【近】 wrest, wring
【记】 ex 出 + torture 折磨，折磨，拷打出来的
【另】 torture 折磨，tortuous 曲折的 contort 扭曲，distort 歪曲 extort 敲诈勒索 retort 反驳
I examine myself three times daily. 吾日三省吾身。
